item.title: Internship Blog 1
item.description: Hello everyone, in this blog I will be sharing with you some of my thoughts on my internship experience as a Quality Assurance Intern over the past four weeks. About my role The company that I am currently working for is gigturbo.Inc, which is a business of developing a personalized AI Scheduling Assistant service that aims to help people to take advantage of the gig economy at a faster and more efficient pace.

item.title: TIG Reflection Week 1
item.description: Hello everyone, I hope you all had a good time during New Year. Just some quick updates of my remote internship, I am working as a Software Quality Assurance intern engineer at gigturbo Inc. Which is a business of developing a personalized AI Scheduling Assistant service that aims to help people to take advantage of the gig economy at a faster and more efficient pace. Currently I am testing different modules of the website and documenting all the bugs that I could find.

item.title: 韦小绿背词 Week 1
item.description: 新的一年，我希望自己能拓展已有的词汇量。于是我购买了《Merriam-Webster’s Vocabulary Builder》一书学习。每天早上吃完早饭之后便尝试去记忆8个新单词，然后做后面的quiz。目前已经坚持了一个星期，拓展自己对于词根的认识，从而遇到生词的时候可以大致才出其意思。我对于新单词的学习仅限于能看懂，大概能拼写，过久了能有大概印象的程度。 至于为什么不“从严”要求自己，我将会把我的思路放在专门介绍我学习思路的博文里面。稍后我会整理出本周所学，更新在本篇博文中。
